General.Name: Prima Alloy Steel Universal
General.Description: PT. Prima Alloy Steel Universal Tbk engages in the manufacture and sale of aluminum alloy wheels in Indonesia, Europe, Asia, Africa, and the United States. The company provides wheels of various models comprising highload, offroad, cratus, electric, and winter. It also exports its products to Germany, Scandinavia, Japan, and Australia. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT. Prima Alloy Steel Universal Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Enmaru International.
